scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bishop standing within an arched frame. He wears a mitre and a cope, and holds a processional cross in his left hand and a book in his right. Behind him, to the left, are buildings resembling a city or town with towers and walls. To the right, a body of water with a small boat is visible. The overall scene suggests a saintly figure associated with a city and possibly a maritime setting.
